errors.error_description: The command to install the optional `schedule` package is incorrect. The package name on PyPI is `schedule`, not `schedule-lib`.
correction_candidates: To use it, install the package via `pip install python-schedule`.
To use it, install the package via `pip install schedule`.
The `schedule` package is included as an extra, install with `pip install irc[schedule]`.
The `schedule` package is built-in and requires no separate installation.
errors.golden_answer: To use it, install the package via `pip install schedule`.
